ere are the triplets extracted from the text:

<Alton Ellis
1:
--------------------
Text: Mr Soul of Jamaica:  It contains twelve tracks recorded between 1967 and 1970 at Duke Reid's Treasure Isle Recording Studios in Kingston, Jamaica and was produced by Reid and released on his Treasure Isle label in 1974.
Triplets:<Mr Soul of Jamaica
2:
--------------------
Text: Mr Soul of Jamaica:  Although this was his only album for the label, Ellis had already been a star musician in Jamaica from the early 1960s onwards, having recorded for Coxone Dodd's Studio One label before moving to Treasure Isle, and the album is a compilation of some of his Treasure Isle singles, although some of his biggest hits including "Rock Steady", "Girl I've Got a Date" and "Cry Tough" were left off it.
Triplets: <Mr Soul of Jamaica
